sentences.sContent: They larded many commercials into a ten-minute period before the soap opera.
sentences.sCn: 他们在肥皂剧前的十分钟内插播了许多商业广告。

sentences.sContent: After some experience in theater, he landed a role in a soap opera and dropped out of high school just shy of graduation.
sentences.sCn: 在取得一些舞台剧演出经验之后，他获得一个肥皂剧的角色，于是没有等到高中毕业就辍学了。

synos.tran: 肥皂剧（以家庭问题为题材的广播或电视连续剧）

trans.tranOther: a television or radio story about the daily lives and relationships of the same group of people, which is broadcast regularly
